function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to comprehend the problems associated with the coronavirus","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing effective solution strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research and analysis of the problems associated with the coronavirus","Technologies":"Information gathering and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and industry professionals","Owner":"Research institutions and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Unprecedented changes and responses to business, economic, and social aspects due to the pandemic","Impact":"Disruption of normal business operations and economic instability","Mitigation":"Adaptation of new strategies and policies to address the changes","Technologies":"Digital communication tools and remote work technologies","People":"Business leaders, economists, and policymakers","Owner":"Businesses, government agencies, and economic institutions"},{"Description":"Variation in the effects of the pandemic on the construction sector based on state suggestions","Impact":"Difficulty in tracking and measuring the impacts of the pandemic on the construction sector","Mitigation":"Collaboration between state governments and industry organizations for data sharing and analysis","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and analytical tools","People":"State government officials and construction industry professionals","Owner":"Government agencies and construction industry associations"}]}
